seg.quote: Of these four suggestions, only one is correct.
The two friends share one job.
The road goes from one side of the town to the other.

sense.def:
Besedo
one
lahko uporabimo, da nam ni treba ponoviti že uporabljenega samostalnika.

seg.quote: These trousers aren't as tight as the other ones.
...buying old houses and building new ones.
Oh, that's a difficult one to answer, isn't it?

sense.def:
Besedo
one
lahko uporabimo v časovnih izrazih za preteklost ali prihodnost. Na primer, če smo nekaj naredili
one day
, to pomeni, da smo tisto naredili določenega dne v preteklosti. Če pa rečemo, da bomo nekaj naredili
one day
, hočemo reči, da bomo tisto naredili nekega dne v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: One evening, I had a visit from Henry Cox.
One day you and I must have a long talk together.
The law should guard one against this sort of thing.

sense.def:
One or two
pomeni zelo malo.

seg.quote: One or two of the girls help in the kitchen.

sense.def:
To be or have one up on someone
pomeni imeti prednost pred nekom;

A hundred and one
ali
a thousand and one
pomeni zelo veliko.

seg.quote: There must be a thousand and one books of this sort on the market.
